sections.heading: Repealed.Section 74-11-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 1994, ch. 117, § 1 and Laws 1994, ch. 126, § 1; repealed by Laws 2005, ch. 171, § 23.

Repeals.— Laws 2005, ch. 171, § 23 repealed 74-11-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1994, ch. 117, § 1 and Laws 1994, ch. 126, § 1, relating to the short title of the Tire Recycling Act, effective June 17, 2005. For provisions of former section,seethe 2004 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

Saving clause.— Laws 2005, ch. 171, § 22, effective June 17, 2005, provided that the repeal of the Tire Recycling Act does not affect the validity of regulations enacted pursuant to the Tire Recycling Act, which shall continue in force and effect until amended or repealed; that repeal of the Tire Recycling Act does not affect prior violations of the Tire Recycling Act or regulations enacted pursuant to the Tire Recycling Act; and that all permits and registrations issued pursuant to the Tire Recycling Act shall remain in effect until they expire or they are suspended, revoked or otherwise modified.
